patterns: what questions do i ask you
whats an example question I can ask
responses: Here are some things you can say:
1. I need help debugging
2. Do I need to detach my app?
3. What are popular React Native apps?
4. Upgrade to the newest sdk
5. How can I get started with Expo?
6. What does Expo do?
Hello! What do you need help with?
Hey! How can I help?
Hi there, how can I help?
Glad to help. Need anything else? Feel free to ask!
No problem. How else can I help?
You're welcome. Can I help with something else?
I didn't quite get that. What do you mean?
I'm not sure I understand. What are you trying to do?
I'm a bit confused. Can you try rephrasing that?
Sorry, I still don't think I understand.
I'm still in early beta and learning a lot as I talk with you.
You can help me improve by adding your chat log to https://github.com/sameesiddiqui/expo-bot/issues
Luckily, the Expo community is really awesome and can probably help you out: https://forums.expo.io
